column2: Hi again! Did you get the parts to make that Stealth Device?
Not yet. I'll be back later.

Fantastic. Fantastic. Let's see them.

Okay, we need to solder this one to the board. That one underneath connected to the emitter.

That one amplifying the input, and finally, this one stabilizing the voltages. Aaahhh! Beautiful. All set.

There you go. Take it. 

So remind me, what were you going to do with it again?
Oh we're just doing some experiments. We'll take good care of it. Thank you!
OK, bye. Let me know if I can help you with any other projects!
